message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $150. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would that work for you?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $115?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I think $125 is the lowest I can go. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $120?
